name: GUT GUT
description:
GUT GUT is a platform game where you have to escape from the rising stomach fluids and help monsters survive their Gut pain.

The Monsters Gut-doctor has created a miracle pill, The "Handy pill".
Inside this medicine, there are these little microbes that it happen to have  quite an uncommon shape 🖐

>> Weekly Game Jam 95 - Bad Cooking  <<

Features to be developed in the future:

    • Local multiplayer (1-4 players)
    • Gamepad support
    • Many monsters stomach to adventure in
    • Plenty of different blocks with their own mechanics
    • Coop / Vs mode / Time trials
CONTROLS CREDITS
